title: Kitchens Of Distinction - Folly (2013) - Flac
description:
=============================
Artist: Kitchens Of Distinction
Title: Folly
Year: 2013
Label: 3 Loop
Country: UK
Format: CD
Style: Indie Rock

First album in 19 yrs
Fitzgerald writes:
These songs came together over a two-year period which began in June 2011 and finished during April 2013.
 As with all songs by Kitchens of Distinction, new and old, they began with the musical structure first, 
the tune and lyrics coming later. With these songs I wrote the initial music, with KOD guitarist Julian Swales
 shaping them, suggesting tempo changes, structure changes, and providing the trademark sonic embellishments 
of his galactic guitar cascades. Dan Goodwin, original KOD drummer, added percussion and rhythm programming support.
 They were recorded in my studio in Derbyshire and at Julian's studio in Brighton. The songs were mixed with
 Pascal Gabriel in April 2013 when I was recovering from a nephrectomy and winter would not leave us.

==============================

07. No Longer Elastic (03:39)
08. I Wish It Would Snow (03:59)
09. Tiny Moments Tiny Omens (03:33)
10. The Most Beautiful Day (03:36)
